dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: I’ve followed the flow to this place, and I’ll cut down all that impedes it.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: I normally rise early in the morning. Watching the sun on the horizon gives me the feeling that the day has begun.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามกลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Rodion… She kept on insisting that she take me to a restaurant. Though the concept is foreign to me, it would seem that some people derive joy from eating.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: When you wish to clear your mind, admiring the moonlight can help.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: You shouldn’t restrain yourself from cutting down whatever obstructs your way, even if it is to wound your heart as well.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: I dislike long conversation. No words hold more weight than those of clashing blades.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Bearing a sword naturally makes your mind calm and your actions swift.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: To become a leader is to sail a vast sea. It is a wide-spanning ordeal, with no destination in clear sight… yet there is nowhere to fall back to.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: To what extents are you willing to go for the sake of your goal, Executive Manager? Alongside that… how much of yourself can you withstand to forfeit?

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: These days, advanced technology makes erasing bloodstains a trivial task, as though it were only right that we forget about death that easily.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: If you so wish… I shall serve you.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: I will dispatch them.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: It’s time to have blades meet.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I’d appreciate it if you could keep it simple.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: I won’t stand back.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: I should be able to slay them with ease.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Mmpf!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: A result earned through calmness.

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: That must be tough to recover, Executive Manager.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I see you know your way around a sword.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: It was my fault for neglecting to train.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: I only followed the path I saw.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: I slew them all, dancing along with the flow.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: I hold no regrets.
